name: Petzl Spirit Express Quickdraw
description: The Spirit Express Draw is light enough to rack up for long sport routes. It has a straight-gate on top and a bent-gate carabiner on the bottom. Nice, ergonomic shape and the webbing offers excellent grip for fumble-free clipping.H-shaped profile offers good strength to weight ratio.Wide contact surfaces so the rope glides and reduced wear on the carabiner.Keylock nose on top carabiner.String webbing prevents the bottom carabiner from rotating, and prevents fraying on the sling.
